answers.answer: I'm still knocked up and waiting... I'll be 38 week Wednesday and been having low backache which is extremely painful at times, contractions here and there, lots and lots of pressure down there, constant bathroom breaks, aching in my groin/ inside legs area(?), sharp shooting pains down there, nipples are beyond sensitive... I'm sure there is more lol... Just anxious to meet my little boy!! I feel I have waited long enough!! He gets the hiccups all the time and my whole tummy jumps, his butt and my right ribs are best buds and it's so uncomfortable!! Docs say his head is engaged and pushing down, I'm 2 almost 3cm and 80% effaced (as of Friday) have a fluid check an nst today, plus the results for my 24 hour urine and if anything looks bad, I'll be sent in today... We will seegood luck everyone, were actually almost done!!

Im still here waiting im 38 weeks today with nothing happening what so ever! cervix still long and closed. Going to see consultant on friday so hopefully she will give me a date for induction. I was at the hospital today for monitoring and they thought i had preeclampsia because i had high blood pressure and protein in my urine. I had the blood test and everything was fine in the end. Just wish my baby boy would just come out then there wont be any scares.

Im here to and i am so ready to have this baby.  I am 39w3d and will be getting induced on thursday.  I just dont want to be preggo beyond 40 weeks and im sure i would be if i dont get induced.  My cervix is only dialated 2cm and didnt change when i went for my appt last friday, it was still long and firm.  Im not having any contractions, just menstrual like like cramps here and there and painless BH's.  Thursday is taking forever.
Hi girls, I am 40 wks today and still no baby. I am scheduled to be induced on Wednesday morning. I will keep you all posted....

Hey ladies... I'm 38.1 week pregnant today and I don't know if I'm dilated or anything cause dr. is out of town and he didn't want to check me to disturb anything and cause me to go into labor while he was on vacation. So I will see him at my 39.4 week appt. if no baby by then, and maybe ask him to strip my membranes...and if labor doesn't start then he said he will induce me on my due date. Lord's Willing. So 13 days to go. Its almost over ladies! =]

That's 6 of us so far...and lots of inductions coming up, wow, good luck everyone!  Asking4, I have a lot of those same pains and have had a burst of energy & someone said that is a sign of impending labor.  yesterday I was cleaning the floors and the tool shed and running around trying to shake him out!  but i feel it could still be a week for me given the law of averages.

I'm still knocked up as well, but only for the next 24 hours or so!!!  I had my 40wk apt today at 855am, the hopsital was too busy to do it today.  Oh well I guess, we will see how tomorrow goes, I am schedualled for my induction tomorrow at 7am!!!

I'm telling you, somethings gotta work!! I've been walking every evening. My nana toldme that with my uncle, everytime she felt the pressure, she would get up and do jumping jacks lol. She said after a day an a half she had him. And what's funny is, she was in the elevator heading to l&d and ended up having him in the elevator. It's crossed my mind!! (the jumping Jack thingy)I have a question for all of you, I'm just wondering if it's just me or if any of you feel this way... I am SO irritable!! Everything makes me mad!! I want to yell at everyone (mind you I haven't, well the nurses lol) but I keep getting after the dog even if she isn't doing anything, Jason's mom, who I love to death, just keeps on talking and that's irritating me (when it never has before) I think I'm just miserable and I can't do anything about it!! Anyone else?

You are not alone.  My son keeps saying Mom, what did i do, why are you yelling at me, then i have to go collect myself and come back an apologize, ive been snapping at everyone, my sister was like i ll be glad when you have that baby bcuz you are extremly B****hy.  I will be glad when i have her to, im going to call the hospital 2mrw to make sure i am still scheduled for thursday, God only knows if i get there thursday and they tell me i have to reschedule ima act a freakn fool lol,  well not much longer for all of us.So it seems like Slzerbst is being induced tuesday, Airqueen on Wednesday, and Me on thursday.  So 3 babies to be announced 4sure by saturday YaY.
That's 7 moms to be, with 4 being induced this week including Asking4 now at the hospital!
I think im going to be the last one standing!! I hope your all gonna be waiting for me and not disappear!

Well Congrats to Asking4, Bryce is here.Best wishes to Slzebrst as she was induced todayBest wishes to Airqueen for she is going in tonightThats 4 of us left,  I understand how you feel wanttobe, it seems like everyone has vanished, but i no they are all enjoying there bundle of joy.  I will be around to still chat after my little one is here and to hear your birth story,  Im sure if you message some of the ladies they will respond back, the forum has become very slow and still since its only a few of us left.Best wishes to the remaining of us
It looks like from the time Asking4 went in to be induced until the time she had Bryce it took about 8 hours, im asuming she had a vaginal delivery but she didnt post a story yet.

question: Hi girls, just taking a quick tally of those of us still waiting to deliver and how you are all feeling after the weekend?  I am trying to be patient, 2 days overdue but was expecting to go late.  It seems strange sitting around waiting for my whole life to change at any moment!LMC
title: Ready to deliver.  Who is left?
